File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\GustavDev\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Shadowheart_CRD_SkinnyDippingRomance.lsj
Synopsis:
CRD for Shadowheart on the Enemy of Shar Path inviting the avatar to a romance scene. Shadowheart is feeling vulnerable after defying her goddess and being declared a heretic. She's now enemy to her former kin, and has been 'marked' (inflicted with so much pain by Shar that her her has partially turned white). Now she concorts a plan to restore some autonomy

uid: 12f33004-e2f6-a6e3-1080-208555c0ab43

0:0 - I hope that's true, but I'm not so sure. She has a far reach, and a long memory.
uid: 14111426-c510-822b-5de1-3c1792b78b53

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\GustavDev\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Shadowheart_CRD_SharRomance.lsj
Synopsis:
Shadowheart and the player wrestle with the nature of their romance, when it has already been stated that Shadowheart must dedicate herself to Shar, leaving no room for others in her life. She helps the player to interpret this in a manner that may let them bend the rules. Heavy on the flirtation and innuendo, as if to defect from less-romantic implications of their relationship status. Chronologically, this will occur after SH has committed to Shar by sacrificing Nightsong, but before the shar path sex scene that centres around a Nightfall ceremony.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Patch1_pak\Mods\GustavDev\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_GoblinHuntTieflingCelebration_CRD_Gale3.lsj
Synopsis:
After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. Gale has been drinking wine, but is not drunk - line delivery shouldn't convey this unless expressly indicated in the VO notes. The wine is mentioned in a few spots, but it shouldn't influence his diction.

Synopsis:
After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. Gale has been drinking wine, but is not drunk. The wine is mentioned in a few spots, but it shouldn't influence his diction.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Patch1_pak\Mods\GustavDev\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Gale_CRD_SpellTeaching2.lsj
Synopsis:
In this scene, Gale is conjuring an image of Mystra over the palm of his hand, staring at the goddess he’s love with, but who abandoned him. When the player approaches, he dispels the image and he feels embarrassed to have been caught doing what he was doing. The conversation turns to his passion for magic however, and he invites the player to try to cast a spell with him together. The player can do so by passing through various stages of spell casting, and when successful, this can lead to a first player-initiated romantic moment with Gale.

> Harmony comes easily to you. Allow it to wash over your mind and magic.
> Think of the here and now: this unexpected moment of learning.
> Picture the silent void of Wildspace, and K'liir nestled within it. Recall standing in the sun, your eyes closed, its gentle heat on your skin. Picture a place of utter peace, away from all harm and the mayhem of civilisation.
> Imagine being a child, innocent, free from your afflictions. Recall a satisfying spar from your youth on Crèche K'liir. Recall the satisfaction of sparring with your father in youth. Think back to before - back when hot blood flowed through your veins. Think of mum and dad dancing in the kitchen. Recall a memory of early youth, a happy family moment.
> Meditate on the verses of the Tla'ket. Try to hum a familiar tune.
> Picture the perfect darkness - to be in the womb of Shar.
> That's too abstract for my tastes. Let's just forget about it, shall we?

Synopsis:
After learning of the Crown of Karsus and the way it means potential ascension, Gale invites the players to share in his potential divinity. He brings them to an illusory part of the Outer planes, where they sail through the stars on a boat.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Patch1_pak\Mods\GustavDev\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Astarion_CRD_SecondNight.lsj
Synopsis:
Second time Astarion propositions the player to sleep with him - optional CRD between his act 1 and act 2 critical path romance scenes. The player starts to realise Astarion might have been just playing an act to seduce them the whole time, and that his affection for them might not be genuine. Bridges the gap before he confesses this in his act 2 romance, and says he wants to stop manipulating people and have a real relationship. Could either be triggered at the party, or any time before the act 2 scene, as long as you've slept with him before. If player agrees to meet up with Astarion later, it will show them meeting up at the bedroll when the player clicks to rest automatically if it's not at the party, if no other overnight scene is queued. If it's at the party, the player has to choose at the bedroll menu to meet up with him.

uid: f05f9ce3-a84d-45cf-ae8e-4cdb6de5a03c

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Patch1_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_OwlbearCub_CRD_2.lsj
Synopsis:
IMPROTANT: If players help the cub in this dialog, it becomes the permamement camp follower. In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. He's slightly injured, and playing it up more than it is, and he's distrustful of the player at first. If the player helps him, he becomes excited and runs off to hunt. In the next night, he returns with a dead bird. The owlbear has appeared in camp for a second night. The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp. He reacts much more suspiciously of the player if they antagonised him in their first encounter.

0:0 - Leave.
uid: 03c8d61d-75ae-b71c-2fa0-aef9b205b607

uid: fec94ab3-948a-2a75-b8c4-f4a4e24af912
> *The cub inspects the wound, giving it a curious peck.*

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_OwlbearCub_CRD_1.lsj
Synopsis:
In SwA, the owlbear cub speaks in short staccato 'sentences.' He's vicious and feral - but scared. If the player coaxes him with food or is nice to him, he will cautiously consider approaching - but is scared off before he gets too close. An owlbear cub - young, but still dangerous - appears in camp. The player has previously spared the cub after killing its mother, and saved it from a cruel game run by the goblins in their camp. The cub is scared, and quick to run or attack - it's an untamed wild animal.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Night3_CRD_Shadowheart.lsj
Synopsis:
Shadowheart confides in the player during the third night that they stop to camp. The expected effects of their tadpole condition have not come to pass, and Shadowheart tries to reason what this might mean. Are they out of the woods, or is this still just the start of something much worse? Hope and disquiet in equal parts.

> Do you think me so sheltered?

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Night3_CRD_Astarion.lsj
Synopsis:
Astartion starts the dialog lying on his bedroll, looking up at the stars. He's somewhat pensive, reflective, thinking that he might lose the ability to walk in the sun - even if it means ultimately saving his life. He gets up and is complImentary towards us, but he gets uncomfortably close and his compliments have a hungry feel to them. Really he's thinking that later tonight he'll come back and drink our blood. He excuses himself, but he's sure that tonight's the night he's going to feed.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Night2_CRD_Astarion.lsj
Synopsis:
You find a contemplative Astarion thinking about the danger we pose if we turn into mind flayers. He asks - hypothetically - if he had to kill us, how would we like to go? As an experienced murderer, he considers it a professional courtesy, but we might be outraged. He'll be enthusiastic when describing the different ways people can die - a fan talking about his favourite subject. If we threaten him, he'll be defensive and a little sulky.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Night1_CRD_Shadowheart.lsj
Synopsis:
The party has stopped to camp for the first time. The player can speak to Shadowheart as they rest. She restates the urgent need to find a healer who can help them with their tadpole problem. If the player elected to confide in other party members ahead of her she'll caution that they may not be trustworthy.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Night1_CRD_Astarion.lsj
Synopsis:
Astarion's trying to adjust to the novelty of being asleep during the night, instead of prowling the streets. The player doesn't know he's a vampire yet, and Astarion doesn't want them to find out. He tells them he has too much to think about to just fall asleep, so offers to take the first watch that night. Emotionally, he finds all of this novel and is curious about his new situation (moving around during the day, resting at night)

After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. For Wyll, you cannot romance if you have not learned about Mizora. He is enjoying himself, it would seem, and toasts you as you approach.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_GoblinHuntTieflingCelebration_CRD_Shadowheart.lsj
Synopsis:
The party has been celebrating how they saved the tiefling refugees from the goblins. Everyone's in high spirits. The player and Shadowheart reflect a little on events and may find themselves open to flirtation. If their relationship with each other (and the absence of any other partners) allows for it, they may agree to another liaison later in the night - a bonding/romantic one.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_GoblinHuntTieflingCelebration_CRD_ROM_Gale.lsj
Synopsis:
After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option. Gale has been drinking wine, but is not drunk. The wine is mentioned in a few spots, but it shouldn't influence his diction.

Synopsis:
After the party, Astarion is standing in a corner, bottle of wine in hand, in a bad mood. Everything's too merry for him, not hedonistic enough. But there's the possibility of a little hedonism with the player, if you both agree to meet up for a little 'fun' later in the night. That's a tantilising thought - there might be something to look forward to after all.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_GoblinHuntRaiderCelebration_CRD_Shadowheart.lsj
Synopsis:
After the goblin victory slaughtering the tieflings, Shadowheart is very inebriated in camp. She feels guilty about the massacre, but can't comprehend why. As a result, she's belligerent and moody with the player unless actively calmed down.

0:0 - In fact, I prefer the wine to your blind stabs at mockery. Get away from me.
uid: 007c7d3f-3e75-e95c-c12f-12610e266aa8
- 0 Set flag(s) to (Object):
   true - CAMP_GoblinHunt_State_ShadowheartRejected - CAMP_GoblinHunt_State_ShadowheartRejecteddescription

0:0 - I'm surprised she hasn't dragged you off to rut already.
uid: 050daa0f-f69e-cc52-a512-a84a316e747a

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_GoblinHuntRaiderCelebration_CRD_Gale.lsj
Synopsis:
The player sided with the drow and goblins and participated in the massacre of the grove. Gale is shocked by what happened and the fact that he participated in the slaughter. He wants to leave, so the player has to convince him to stay if indeed he wants Gale to stay. The mood and tone are dour and dark.

Synopsis:
Astarion is enjoying himself at a party with the goblins. You've betrayed and slaughtered the tieflings and he's finally able to indulge his hedonistic side. He's drinking blood, but offers you wine. He or you can propose that you get together tonight and enjoy a little more hedonism when everyone else is asleep.

File E:\BG3_Unpack\Gustav_pak\Mods\Gustav\Story\Dialogs\Camp\Camp_Relationship_Dialogs\CAMP_Betrayal_CRD_Gale.lsj
Synopsis:
Gale has asked the player for magical items to consume, but he’s received none. He now informs the player they’re no longer needed. It’s a tense scene because despite multiple demands the player did nothing to help Gale, and Gale is not forthcoming with information about the nature of the solution he found. It will later turn out that he made a deal with a devil.
